channel.title: The simplest way to contribute with basiux in 2015
channel.description:
As [posted on the quest blog](/talk/t/my-social-unfair-undervaluation-and-why-the-financial-system-is-broken/7751?u=cregox), the campaign starts with this little introduction:
> Hi, I'm cregox, the artificial mind of Caue Rego, still not uploaded to the cloud and living in a meat sack.
> We're trying to build basiux - an engine capable to help the whole world of achieving such unimaginable things.
We've just [updated](https://github.com/basiux/basiux.github.io/commit/de8615858ffbb5747ec308f8650f4fb02b2f0940) the website to add [our patreon campaign to basiux](http://patreon.com/cregox):
http://patreon.com/cregox
But of course, any wish to participate more will always be welcomed. Just keep on [getting well informed](/talk/t/reality-philosophy-time-mostly-about-education/7754) and then get in touch with us! :)
#edited Just [made a typeform to ask for feedback on the patreon campaign](https://cregox.typeform.com/to/NFTkop). You can also just reply to this topic to give some feedback.
## Every single input is much appreciated! :smile:

item.title: The simplest way to contribute with basiux in 2015
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

As posted on the quest blog, the campaign starts with this little introduction:

Hi, I'm cregox, the artificial mind of Caue Rego, still not uploaded to the cloud and living in a meat sack.

We're trying to build basiux - an engine capable to help the whole world of achieving such unimaginable things.

We've just updated the website to add our patreon campaign to basiux:

http://patreon.com/cregox

But of course, any wish to participate more will always be welcomed. Just keep on getting well informed and then get in touch with us!

edited

Just made a typeform to ask for feedback on the patreon campaign. You can also just reply to this topic to give some feedback.

Every single input is much appreciated!
